experiences.title: Wholistic
details: Built project dashboard with tools for management and efficiency.
Developed AI assistant for recommendations and user productivity.
Implemented commenting system for communication and documentation.
Integrated with Google Workspace and Slack for automation.
Created WYSIWYG template builder for uniform project reports.
Enabled user and role creation for team management.

experiences.title: Woodcore
details: Rebranded landing page, boosted customer acquisition.
Led migration to Typescript for CBA console.
Reduced code bloat by 40k lines, improved DRY.
Reduced dependency on external frontend libraries
25% fewer bug reports, 40% fewer code errors post-migration.
Optimized network calls, accelerated loan setup by 30%.
Enhanced admin console for user efficiency.

experiences.title: Lendsqr
details: Collaborated cross-functionally, delivered to 3k+ orgs and 1m+ users.
Mentored 3 junior developers for seamless onboarding.
Initiated brown bag sessions for knowledge sharing.
Conducted code reviews, maintained coding standards.

experiences.title: P2Vest & Digithome
details: Pioneered lending service platform build, easing loans for civil servants.
Collaborated with design/product teams for optimal user experience.
Contributed end-to-end in creating the E-Real Estate Management platform.
Enhanced search feature with filters for users in all 36 Nigerian states.
